SELECT warehouse.id, warehouse.num, warehouse.campus, goods.id as goods_id, goods.goods_name, goods.specs, goods.price, goods.money_type, goods.limit_buy_type, goods.limit_buy_num, goods.images, goods.goods_type, t.classification, goods.barcode FROM aixin_warehouse warehouse, aixin_goods goods, aixin_goods_type t warehouse.goods_id = goods.id AND goods.goods_type = t.id AND warehouse.campus = #{campus} AND warehouse.num >= #{lowCount} AND warehouse.num <= #{highCount} AND goods.goods_name LIKE concat('%',#{goodsName}, '%')
LIMIT #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}
